item.title: Quick Wins for your Password Manager
item.description: Passwords protect so many parts of our lives, from our money to our businesses and even the appliances in our smart homes. Remembering all these passwords can be a real challenge, particularly when every account has different password requirements. That’s where password managers can help.

item.title: Microsoft Office 365 email encryption could expose message content
item.description: Security researchers at WithSecure have discovered it's possible to partially or fully infer the contents of encrypted messages sent through Microsoft Office 365, highlighting an intrinsic weakness in the encryption scheme used.
item.author: (Bill Toulas)
